bell.title: 🔔 Claim Free NFT
bell.gif_guide_title:
💡 Follow the reminders to
turn on email notifications
bell.open_notification_prompt:
You can authorize our email push service at any time by flipping the switch above and clicking "Allow".

Don't worry, we will only notify you when you receive new emails.

Complete the authorization and we will send you a confirmation email with a special NFT ;)
bell.open_notification_prompt_list:

home.title: The mail for crypto natives
home.desc: Take control of your mail communication with decentralized ID by Mail3.

trash.title: Trash
trash.auto-delete: Messages that have been in Trash more than 30 days will be automatically deleted.

spam.title: Spam
spam.auto-delete: Messages that have been in Spam more than 30 days will be automatically deleted.

drafts.title: Drafts
drafts.no-content-w1: Any time you start writing a new Email,
drafts.no-content-w2: Mail3 will automatically save it as a draft along the way.
drafts.no-content-w3: Come here to find all your works in progress.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to continue?
delete.description: This operation will completely delete the message and cannot be recovered.

trash.ok: The message has been moved to the trash.

delete.ok: The message has been completely deleted.

spam.ok: The messages have been moved to spam

notSpam.ok: The messages have been moved to Inbox

regardless of whether they are selected as the default outgoing address.
